name: Instacash Preauth LLC
description: Operator of a peer-to-peer lending marketplace intended to improve money access by increasing better loan opportunities. The company's marketplace uses credit card line pre-authorizations as collateral and offers immediate transfers and secure repayments, enabling customers to lend money directly to each other, without worrying about returns.
one_liner: Operator of a peer-to-peer lending marketplace intended to improve money access by increasing better loan opportunities.
